metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare innovations are helping CIOs transform their corporate networks, embrace Zero Trust security and improve business agility.

relatedBlades.title: CIO Week 2021
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare innovations are helping CIOs transform their corporate networks, embrace Zero Trust security and improve business agility.

features.title: Welcome to CIO Week
features.description: This week, we'll demonstrate how Cloudflare One, our Zero Trust Network-as-a-Service, is helping CIOs transform their corporate networks.

features.title: Cloudflare One: One Year Later
features.description: Cloudflare One helps enterprises build modern enterprise networks, operate efficiently and securely, and throw out on-premise hardware. It's been more than a year since we announced the product suite, and we wanted to check in on how things are going.

features.title: Replace your hardware firewalls with Cloudflare One
features.description: We're excited to announce new capabilities to help customers make the switch from hardware firewall appliances to a true cloud-native firewall built for next-generation networks.

imageAssetFile.altText: Replace your hardware firewalls with Cloudflare One
imageAssetFile.title: Replace your hardware firewalls with Cloudflare One

features.title: Press Release: Cloudflare Expands Its Zero Trust Platform; Announces New Firewall Capabilities to Help Customers Leave their Hardware Behind
features.description: Cloudflare announced it's expanding its Zero Trust firewall capabilities to help companies secure their entire corporate network across all of their branch offices, data centers, and clouds—no matter where their employees are working from. Cloudflare also announced Oahu, a new program to help customers migrate from legacy hardware to the Cloudflare One suite of Zero Trust solutions.

features.title: Announcing Anycast IPsec: a new on-ramp to Cloudflare One
features.description: Use IPsec as an on-ramp to Cloudflare One and integrate your existing SD-WAN with Cloudflare Magic WAN.

features.title: PII and Selective Logging controls for Cloudflare's Zero Trust platform
features.description: With two new features, Zero Trust role-based access and selective logging, administrators will be able to protect not only their users but also the data their users generate.

features.title: How to connect your offices to Cloudflare using SD-WAN
features.description: Today, a more modern approach is to use SD-WAN to configure your networks and connect them to Cloudflare's network, leveraging that as the new corporate backbone. It's quick and easy!

imageAssetFile.altText: How to connect your offices to Cloudflare using SD-WAN
imageAssetFile.title: How to connect your offices to Cloudflare using SD-WAN

features.title: How We Used eBPF to Build Programmable Packet Filtering in Magic Firewall
features.description: By combining the power of eBPF and Nftables, Magic Firewall can mitigate sophisticated attacks on infrastructure by enforcing a positive security model.

imageAssetFile.altText: How We Used eBPF to Build Programmable Packet Filtering in Magic Firewall
imageAssetFile.title: How We Used eBPF to Build Programmable Packet Filtering in Magic Firewall

features.title: CFTV: What's Launching Monday Part 1
features.description:
Neil Patel, Chris Arges

How to connect your offices to Cloudflare using SD-WAN and How We Used eBPF to Build Programmable Packet Filtering in Magic Firewall

features.title: CFTV: What's Launching Monday Part 2
features.description:
Sam Rhea, Rustam Lalkaka, Achiel van der Mandele, Annika Garbers, Ankur Aggarwal

Cloudflare One: One Year Later, PII and Selective Logging controls for Cloudflare's Zero Trust platform, Announcing Anycast IPsec: a new on-ramp to Cloudflare One, Replace your hardware firewalls with Cloudflare One

features.title: CFTV: Fireside Chat with Juan Rodriguez
features.description: In this special CIO Week session, join Cloudflare Product Manager Annika Garbers for a fireside chat with Juan Rodriguez, Cloudflare's Chief Information Officer.

features.title: Store your Cloudflare logs on R2
features.description: We're excited to announce that customers will soon be able to store their Cloudflare logs on Cloudflare R2 storage. Storing your logs on Cloudflare will give CIOs and Security Teams an opportunity to consolidate their infrastructure; creating simplicity, savings and additional security.

imageAssetFile.altText: Store your Cloudflare logs on R2
imageAssetFile.title: Store your Cloudflare logs on R2

features.title: Introducing the Customer Metadata Boundary
features.description: Cloudflare's Data Localisation Suite now helps customers localise metadata about their HTTP traffic.

features.title: Control input on suspicious sites with Cloudflare Browser Isolation
features.description: Protect your team from phishing attacks by controlling user input on suspicious and sensitive websites with Cloudflare Browser Isolation.

features.title: CFTV: Fireside Chat with Kelly Bissell
features.description: In this CIO Week Segment, Cloudflare co-founder, President, and COO Michelle Zatlyn hosts a fireside chat with Kelly Bissell, leader of Accenture Security. Kelly oversees Accenture's full spectrum of security services including advanced cyber defense, applied cybersecurity solutions and managed security services. He is a member of Accenture's Global Management Committee.

features.title: CFTV: What's Launching on Tuesday
features.description:
In this CIO Week segment, Cloudflare product managers and engineers will take a deep dive into the products and features we launched today. 

Cloudflare Log Storage; Customer Metadata Boundary; Cloudflare Browser Isolation

features.title: Why Cloudflare Bought Zaraz
features.description: Today we're excited to announce that Cloudflare has acquired Zaraz. The Zaraz value proposition aligns with Cloudflare's mission. They aim to make the web more secure, more reliable, and faster. And they built their solution on Cloudflare Workers.

features.title: Press Release: Cloudflare Acquires Zaraz to Boost Website Speed and Security Without Sacrificing Privacy
features.description: Cloudflare announced that it has acquired Zaraz, a company that has developed technology to speed up and secure websites by reducing the impact of third-party marketing and analytics tools. Zaraz is the first company Cloudflare has acquired built on its own technology, Cloudflare Workers.

features.title: Announcing Foundation DNS — Cloudflare's new premium DNS offering
features.description: Today we're launching Foundation DNS — our new premium DNS offering! Leverage Cloudflare DNS and ensure your domain is always globally available within milliseconds.

features.title: Cloudflare acquires Zaraz to enable cloud loading of third-party tools
features.description: We are excited to announce the acquisition of Zaraz by Cloudflare, and the launch of a beta version of the Zaraz product. You can use Zaraz (beta) to manage and load third-party tools on the cloud, and achieve significant speed, privacy and security improvements.

features.title: Zaraz use Workers to make third-party tools secure and fast
features.description: Zaraz fundamentally changes how third-parties are loaded on the web. Learn how we built it from the ground up, and why we chose Cloudflare Worker to power it.

features.title: Page Shield is generally available
features.description: To help identify and mitigate supply chain attacks in the context of web applications, today we are launching Page Shield in General Availability (GA).

features.title: Zero Trust Private Networking Rules
features.description: Earlier this year, we announced the ability to build a private network on Cloudflare's network with identity-driven access controls. We're excited to share that you will soon be able to extend that control to sessions and login intervals as well.

features.title: Extending Cloudflare's Zero Trust platform to support UDP and Internal DNS
features.description: Last year, we launched a new feature which empowered users to begin building a private network on Cloudflare. Today, we're excited to announce even more features which make your Zero Trust migration easier than ever.

imageAssetFile.altText: Extending Cloudflare's Zero Trust platform to support UDP and Internal DNS
imageAssetFile.title: Extending Cloudflare's Zero Trust platform to support UDP and Internal DNS

features.title: Introducing Clientless Web Isolation
features.description: Safely browse risky and sensitive websites on any device without installing any software

features.title: Guest Blog: k8s tunnels with Kudelski Security
features.description: At Kudelski Security, we've been working on implementing our Zero Trust strategy for the last two years. In many aspects, it's been an incredible journey, and although we're not quite finished yet, we're excited by the progress made so far with Cloudflare.

features.title: CFTV: What's Launching on Wednesday
features.description:
Marc Lamik, Yair Dovrat, Yo'av Moshe

In this CIO Week segment, Cloudflare product managers and engineers will take a deep dive into the products and features we launched today.

features.title: CFTV: Fireside Chat with Harry Moseley
features.description:
In this CIO Week segment, join Cloudflare Director of Product Rustam Lalkaka for a fireside chat with Harry Moseley, Chief Information Officer at Zoom. 

Harry was formerly the CIO of KPMG, Blackstone, Credit Suisse, and UBS, and has extensive experience in solutions development, infrastructure, security, strategic planning, and building technology teams.

features.title: CFTV: Zaraz Tech Talk
features.description: Yo'av Moshe, Simona Pop, Ruskin Constant

features.title: CFTV: What's Launching on Wednesday Part 2
features.description: Page Shield is now generally available, Early Access to UDP and Private DNS with Cloudflare's Zero Trust Platform; k8s and Tunnels with Kuldeski Security

features.title: CFTV: Fireside Chat with David Clarke
features.description: In this CIO Week segment, join Cloudflare's Head of Australia & New Zealand Raymond Maisano for a fireside chat with David Clarke, Director, Platforms, Integration & Data, at Australia's National Disability Insurance Agency, NDIS.

features.title: Cloudflare announces partnerships with leading cyber insurers and incident response providers
features.description: Cloudflare partners with leading cyber insurers and incident response providers to help customers reduce their insurance premiums and improve cyber risk.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare announces partnerships with leading cyber insurers and incident response providers
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare announces partnerships with leading cyber insurers and incident response providers

features.title: Introducing Cloudflare Security Center
features.description: Today we're launching Security Center, which is making attack surface management actionable and accessible for everyone, built on Cloudflare's unique visibility into Internet activity and expertise on security best practices.

features.title: Magic Firewall gets Smarter
features.description: To improve security, we're adding threat intel integration and geo-blocking. For visibility, we're packet captures at the edge, a way to see packets arrive at the edge in near real-time.

features.title: Shadow IT: make it easy for users to follow the rules
features.description: We're excited to announce updates to Cloudflare for Teams that address Shadow IT challenges. Our Zero Trust platform provides a framework to identify new applications, block applications and provide a single location for approved applications.

imageAssetFile.altText: Shadow IT: make it easy for users to follow the rules
imageAssetFile.title: Shadow IT: make it easy for users to follow the rules

features.title: How to customize your layer 3/4 DDoS protection settings
features.description: Cloudflare Enterprise customers using the Magic Transit and Spectrum services can now tune and tweak their L3/4 DDoS protection settings directly from the Cloudflare dashboard or via the Cloudflare API.

features.title: CFTV: What's Launching on Thursday
features.description:
Malavika Balachandran Tadeusz,	Dan Gould

In this CIO Week segment, Malavika and Dan will take a deep dive into the products and features we launched today. 

Cloudflare Security Center

features.title: CFTV: What's Launching on Thursday Part 2
features.description:
Omer Yoachimik, Vivek Ganti

In this CIO Week segment, Omer and Vivek will take a deep dive into the products and features we launched today. 

How to Customize Your Layer 3/4 DDoS Protection Settings

features.title: CFTV: Fireside Chat with Jordan Hager
features.description:
In this CIO Week segment, join Annika Garbers, Product Manager, Cloudflare for a fireside chat with Jordan Hager, VP, Hosting Architecture – Cloud, Site Reliability, and DevOps, Q2. 

Jordan is an 18 year veteran of the SaaS industry with Enterprise level experience running large scale IT Operations, Architecture, Site Reliability and DevOps organizations. Jordan's teams interface with Product and Development teams to ensure effective, secure, and quality delivery of the company's product delivery process.

features.title: Cloudflare One helps optimize user connectivity to Microsoft 365
features.description: Cloudflare One partners with Microsoft to optimize user connectivity to Microsoft 365

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Joins Microsoft Network Performance Partners
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare Joins Microsoft Network Performance Partners

features.title: Introducing Cloudflare Domain Protection — Making Domain Compromise a Thing of the Past
features.description: Today we are announcing secure domain registrations bundled into enterprise contracts.

features.title: Argo for Packets is Generally Available
features.description: What would you say if we told you your IP network can be faster by 10%, and all you have to do is reach out to your account team to make it happen? Today, we're announcing the general availability of Argo for Packets, which provides IP layer network optimizations

imageAssetFile.altText: Argo for Packets is Generally Available
imageAssetFile.title: Argo for Packets is Generally Available

features.title: Cloudflare Agent — Seamless Deployment at Scale
features.description: Today we are excited to announce our zero trust agent now has feature parity across all major platforms.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Agent - Seamless Deployment at Scale
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare Agent - Seamless Deployment at Scale

features.title: Cloudflare announces integrations with MDM companies
features.description: Today, we're excited to announce new integrations with mobile device management vendors Microsoft, Ivanti, JumpCloud, Kandji, and Hexnode to make the deployment of Cloudflare WARP even easier.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare for Teams Integrates with your MDM Provider
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare for Teams Integrates with your MDM Provider

features.title: CFTV: Fireside Chat with Adam Healy
features.description:
In this CIO Week segment, join Sam Rhea, Director of Product Management, Cloudflare for a fireside chat with Adam Healy, Chief Information Officer, BlockFi. 

Adam has over 15 years of technology and security experience, having held roles at Bakkt, Palantir Technologies, Microsoft, the U.S. intelligence community, and Department of Defense. He's been responsible for designing and implementing numerous strategic IT initiatives within the U.S. government through his work both domestically and during multiple overseas postings, as well as enabling critical cybersecurity programs for Fortune 100 companies. With his background safeguarding institutions spanning from Wall Street to Silicon Valley, he is instrumental in BlockFi's growth as security controls within the crypto industry evolve to face a more sophisticated threat landscape. Adam studied computer and information science at the University of Maryland, holds several security certifications, and is often found speaking at security and crypto conferences worldwide.

features.title: CFTV: What's Launching Friday Part 1
features.description: In this CIO Week segment, David and Ameet will take a deep dive into the products and features we launched today.

features.title: CFTV: What's Launching Friday Part 2
features.description: In this CIO Week segment, David, Ameet, and Erika will take a deep dive into the products and features we launched today.

features.title: CFTV: Fireside Chat with Arvind Jain
features.description:
In this CIO Week segment, join Nitin Rao, SVP, Global Infrastructure, Cloudflare for a fireside chat with Arvind Jain, CEO, Glean.

Arvind helped found Glean to make it easy for people to find the information they need to be more productive and happier at work. Prior to Glean, Arvind co-founded and led R&D at Rubrik, one the fastest growing companies in cloud data management, and worked at Google, where he spent over a decade leading various teams in Search, Maps, and YouTube.

features.title: How Cloudflare Is Solving Network Interconnection for CIOs
features.description: Instant network provisioning in over 1000 new locations coming over the next year makes it faster and easier than ever to interconnect with Cloudflare.

imageAssetFile.altText: How Cloudflare Is Solving Network Interconnection for CIOs
imageAssetFile.title: How Cloudflare Is Solving Network Interconnection for CIOs

features.title: Version and Stage Configuration Changes with HTTP Applications in Beta
features.description: Today, we are announcing a closed beta of HTTP Applications: a new way to safely test and deploy changes to your HTTP traffic.

features.title: Updates to Cloudflare Security and Privacy Certifications and Reports
features.description: Customer confidence in our ability to handle their sensitive information in an ever-changing regulatory landscape has to be as solid as our offerings, so we have expanded the scope of our previously-existing compliance validations; not only that, we've also managed to obtain a couple of new ones.

imageAssetFile.altText: Updates to Cloudflare Security and Privacy Certifications and Reports
imageAssetFile.title: Updates to Cloudflare Security and Privacy Certifications and Reports

features.title: All the Platform Improvements We've Made in 2021 to Make CIOs Lives Easier
features.description: While over time best practices and technologies change, we aim to ensure our platform meets the security needs and depth of control that our customers require. In that spirit, we have been busy over the past year delivering important updates to many of our platform services.

features.title: What's new with Notifications?
features.description: We know that notifications are incredibly important to our customers. Cloudflare sits in between your Internet property and the rest of the world. When something goes wrong, you want to know right away because it could have a huge impact on your end users.
